str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Wind, breath, spirit.
From alethes; truth.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come, go.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To lead, guide; met: I instruct, teach. From hodegos; to show the way (teach).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
From alethes; truth.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To bring back word, report; I announce, declare. From ana and the base of aggelos; to announce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: To come, go.
